title: Rheumatic Diseases
description: Primarily affects the joints, causing pain, swelling, and joint deformity.

title: Osteoarthritis
description: The cartilage in joints breaks down, leading to pain, stiffness, and reduced mobility.

title: Ankylosing Spondylitis
description: Mainly affects the spine, causing inflammation and leading to the fusion of spinal vertebrae.

title: Scleroderma
description: A group of diseases that involve the hardening and tightening of the skin and connective tissues.
